resources.string:
Hello,

I use %1$s, the secure instant messenger that protects users’ privacy.

My Threema ID: https://threema.id/%2$s

Let’s communicate via %1$s!

Cheers,
Hi! Let’s use %1$s to communicate in a safe and privacy-compliant way! My Threema ID: https://threema.id/%2$s
Threema. The secure messenger that protects our privacy
Keep Threema users in sync with your device’s address book
Do not sync Threema users with your device’s address book
Anybody can send you a message. New contacts will be added automatically when the first message arrives.
Only people on your contact list can send you a message.
Enter key adds a new line
Do not play any in-app sounds
Do not vibrate when receiving messages
Check for new messages periodically (uses more battery!)
Check for new messages on push only
Events and network information will be logged to the file debug_log.txt
Re-register the device for push notifications with FCM/HMS

We are about to send an SMS to:

%1$s

Is this number correct?
Linking phone number to your ID
The public key that you have scanned does not match the key that the server has stored for this ID. This means that somebody has manipulated the scanned code, and that the key should not be trusted.
The ID has been successfully scanned and the contact is now verified.
This ID has already been scanned and verified.
Your Threema ID is already linked to this mobile number
Your Threema ID is already linked to this email address
Do you really want to delete %d chat(s)? You will not be able to recover the messages.
Do you really want to delete this contact and all associated messages?
Your mobile number has been successfully verified.
Verifying your mobile number failed. Please make sure the number you entered is correct and you are connected to your mobile network before trying again.
Verifying your mobile number failed. The verification process has been aborted.

Unless you have created a backup or exported and saved a copy of this ID, you will never be able to send or receive messages with this ID again.\n\nIf you don’t intend to use this ID again, you should remove any linked email addresses/phone numbers before you delete it.
Last warning: do you really want to delete your ID on this device?
Permanently delete your ID and all data on this device
Your ID export will be encrypted with a password. Use a combination of letters, numbers and symbols. Do not forget what you enter here!

The text string displayed above or the QR code, along with the password that you have chosen, can be used to restore your ID on another device. You should copy it to a suitable place, share it by email or scan the QR code using another device.
The following text string can be used together with the chosen password to restore your Threema ID.
Tap here to enter your passphrase
Set a passphrase to protect your master key. Note that you will have to enter it each time Threema restarts.
The master key is still locked. Would you like to try again?
Enter or paste the text string of the ID export to restore
You don’t have any contacts yet. Turn on synchronization (Settings > Privacy) or add contacts manually.
Your Threema master key is protected by a passphrase. Enter your passphrase to unlock the key.

If you proceed, we will attempt to call you immediately. Your verification code will be read to you twice. Note that we will only make one attempt, so please be sure that you are ready before you continue.
Please enter the code from the verification SMS or mentioned in the phone call.
The code you entered is not valid.
This code has expired. Please scan it again directly from the other user’s app.
No connection to the internet, invalid ID export data or incorrect password
Selected file is not an image
Connection error, please try again later.
Selected file is not a video
File is larger than the maximum of 50 MB
Please enter your shop license key or click here to retrieve your key: https://shop.threema.ch/retrieve_keys
The license key is invalid. Would you like to try again or quit Threema?
The push token has been reset
Touch to fetch and view new incoming messages.
New messages do not trigger a notification when the master key is locked
New messages trigger a generic notification when the master key is locked
Your data will be saved in a ZIP file on your internal USB storage and can be restored on any Android device. Please enter a password to protect your data backup with.
Enter the password that you used to create this backup.
Include large media files (video, documents, original pictures)
Enter your Threema PIN to continue
Time until the screen lock is activated
PIN set. Tap here to change
Protect your privacy by setting a numeric PIN (digits only). This PIN can be used to lock access to Threema’s UI after a grace time or to protect private chats
Need to select at least one member to continue
You may not select more than %1$d group members
Do you really want to leave this group?
“%1$s” has been removed from the group.
You cannot send a message to an empty group
You are not a member of this group
The contact is still a member or creator of a group conversation and therefore cannot be deleted. Leave or delete all groups that include this contact and try again.
The IDs listed here will be ignored when synchronizing contacts
Messages from IDs listed here will be ignored.
This contact is linked to a record in your phone’s addressbook. If you delete it in Threema it will reappear after a contact sync.\nWould you like to exclude it from synchronization?
Set the sorting order of entries in the contact list
Display multi-color placeholders if contact picture is missing
Use gray placeholders if contact picture is missing
Show all Threema IDs in your contact list
Do you really want to unlink this contact?
Validate all Threema contact links with the Android address directory
The keyboard covers the application if your device is in landscape mode
Display a preview of the chat above the keyboard if there’s room
Manage your Threema ID from within Threema.
Failed to update push token, please try again later.
Save incoming pictures and videos as well as outgoing camera pictures in unencrypted form
Do you really want to remove this list and delete its messages?
Choose a name for this list
We could not find a push service on your device because Google Play Services are not installed or outdated. Threema will check for new messages every 15 minutes.
Internal contact, prepopulated by your organization.
Internal contact whose identity and public key you have personally verified by scanning their QR code.
Contact whose identity and public key you have personally verified by scanning their QR code.
Contact whose phone number and/or email address is contained in your address book.
Unknown contact; either this contact did not link a phone number nor an email address to their ID, or your address book does not contain these contact details.
Do not show thumbnails in app switcher and disable screenshots of select screens
Could not open media file. It was deleted or not downloaded from the server.
No %s were found in this chat.
Do you really want to delete %d media messages?
Threema keeps the passphrase in memory. If you need to re-enter the passphrase often, make sure that task killer and battery saver apps that may terminate Threema prematurely, are disabled.
This ID is already in your contact list
Free at least %1$s to receive the message
A modern ZIP tool with AES support is needed in order to unzip the file, e.g. http://www.7-zip.org or https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-unarchiver/id425424353
The chat will be sent as an encrypted zip file. Please choose a password:
Need to define at least two choices
Do you really want to delete %1$d poll(s)? You will not be able to recover the votes.
Poll closed. Tap to view results
Quickly create an online poll directly with Threema. Schedule an event, create a survey or ask your friends anything you want.
You cannot send messages to a blocked contact
Future messages from this contact will be discarded. Continue?
You cannot send messages to an invalid contact
Please enter at least two answers for a poll.
Warning: %1$s will not be able to participate in your poll.
Warning: %1$d contacts will not be able to participate in your poll.
If you continue, push messages will be disabled and Threema will check for new messages every 15 minutes.
If you haven’t already done so, save your ID export text string or the corresponding QR code to a safe place or print it. Your Threema ID cannot be restored without a backup.
Do you really want to remove all wallpapers?
The password you enter here allows you to revoke your ID at https://myid.threema.ch/revoke in case you lose it or it gets stolen
No unread messages or PIN lock activated
This image has already been added.
No app found to open this file.
Warning: %1$d contacts cannot receive your file.

Transferring uncompressed files and images can cause substantial data usage that may lead to additional charges by your mobile provider. We recommend to upload and download files in WiFi networks only.
Require a passphrase to unlock local encryption
Delete media and files older than:

If you run out of free space, you can delete older encrypted media files to make room. Thumbnails will still be kept. Note that this is not an automatic process. Unless you hit one of the buttons below, nothing will be deleted.
If you continue, the files will be deleted and only thumbnails will be kept.
Clean up media, files and messages
If you continue, the messages will be permanently deleted. You will not be able to recover them.
You can also remove older messages completely.
Note: The system’s character set may not be able to display all emojis supported by Threema.
The ID that you have scanned does not match the contact that you have stored.
Would you like to save changes to group?
No map application found on this device
Send Logfile to Threema for further analysis in case of problems
To save or send media, allow Threema permission to access storage.
To send a location, allow Threema permission to access your position.
To send contacts, allow Threema permission to read contacts.
Too many incorrect attempts. Try again in %s seconds.
Move your finger on the screen
Your Threema ID works just like a phone number.\nYour friends can reach you through this ID.
Your friends will see your nickname in their notifications
Link your mobile number and/or your email to your Threema ID.
Link your mobile number to your Threema\u00A0ID.
Switch on to see which friends are using Threema.
A stable Internet connection is required to create your unique Threema ID. Please try again.
Do you want to use your Threema ID as your nickname?
Either the phone number or the email address you entered are not valid.\nPlease correct before proceeding.
The phone number you entered is not valid.\nPlease correct before proceeding.

By moving your finger, you create random data (called entropy) that is used to generate the keypair associated with your new unique Threema ID. The keypair consists of a public key that is distributed to your friends and a private key that is safely stored on your phone. Your friends will encrypt messages to you with your public key. Only the owner of the private key and nobody else is able to decrypt these messages.
You also created a key pair. The public key has been securely transmitted to our servers. The private key never leaves your device. This ensures that nobody else can read your messages.
If you enable this option, Threema one-way encrypts (hashes) email addresses and phone numbers before sending them to the server to look for matching contacts. We do not store any addressbook data.

By providing your phone number and email address, Threema can help your friends find you automatically if they have you in their phone’s address book. The data will be stored in a one-way encrypted (hashed) form on our server. You can simply skip this step, if you would like to use Threema completely anonymously.

By providing your phone number, Threema can help your friends find you automatically if they have you in their phone’s address book. The number will be stored in a one-way encrypted (hashed) form on our server. You can simply skip this step, if you would like to use Threema completely anonymously.

The nickname is used in push notifications on some devices or as an additional means of identifying you to users who do not yet have you in their address book. We recommend providing only your first name or a pseudonym. If you don’t set a nickname, we’ll use your Threema ID by default.
Your mobile number is not yet verified.
Do you really want to abort the mobile number verification?
Poll “%1$s” has received a new vote
You have entered neither a mobile number nor an email address to link to your Threema ID. You will not appear on your friends\’ contact lists. Do you really want to use Threema anonymously?
You did not enter a mobile number to link to your Threema ID. You will not appear on your friends\’ contact lists. Do you really want to use Threema anonymously?
Or scan the QR code of your ID export
Please wait for at least 10 minutes for the SMS to arrive before requesting a call.
You are the administrator of this group. If you leave it now, it will become orphaned. The other members will still be able to chat but changes will no longer be possible.
Do you really want to delete this group completely? All messages will be removed and remaining members can no longer use the group.
Not enough memory to complete this action
Some settings have been disabled by device policy
This will create a clone of this group with you as the administrator. Continue?
Use earpiece for voice message playback if proximity sensor is covered
No media found in this chat
Max. %d items can be edited at once
Do you want to mark this chat as private? Use the menu to toggle visibility of private chats in the message list.

Threema allows you to protect certain chats with a PIN and temporarily hide them from your message list. To enable private chats, please set a PIN or enable System Screen Lock (Android 6.0+) in settings.
If you remove access protection now, your private chats will become visible again.
Display a list of recently added images in the attachments popup
Display recent chats when sharing from other apps
Please connect your device to the charger and disable all energy saving options to prevent your device from interrupting the backup or restore process.
Really reset notification sound settings to defaults?
Notification sound settings have been reset.
Threema Channel provides you with news about all things Threema. Would you like to subscribe to Threema Channel and add it to your contacts? It’s free and you can unsubscribe at any time.
Do you really want to delete %1$d contacts and all associated chats?
%d contacts could not be deleted because they are still part of a group
Hold on. The app will be restarted in a few seconds.
Battery optimization prevents %1$s from working correctly when your phone falls into sleep mode. Please disable battery optimization for %2$s.
Select “All Apps” in the drop down menu
Search for %s in the list and deactivate the optimization
Do you really want to keep battery optimization switched on for %1$s? %2$s will not work correctly.
If you switch or lose your device, nobody can restore your Threema ID or your chats if you don’t have a backup. Please save your data using the appropriate backup options.

Data backups contain:

● Your ID and your key pair
● Contacts and trust levels
● Group memberships
● Chats
● Media and files (optional)

Data will be saved to an encrypted ZIP file. It is recommended to move the file away from the device after the backup has completed successfully.
Would you like to discard changes?
Allow IPv6 for Threema Calls and Threema Web
Disallow IPv6 for Threema Calls and Threema Web
To apply this setting, the app needs to restart.
Who can see your profile picture?
Hide profile pictures provided by your contacts
Show profile pictures provided by your contacts
The contacts selected in this list will receive your profile picture when you send them a message.

Saving large media files to a local ZIP backup may exceed the CPU and memory capacity of your device and can take a very long time. Threema will not send or receive messages while the backup is running. Continue anyway?
Unable to launch Threema. Please turn your device off, then on again.
Establish a direct connection, if possible, and only relay calls to unverified contacts through Threema servers. May expose your IP address.
Force relaying all calls through Threema servers, protecting your IP address. May affect call quality.
To make encrypted calls and send voice messages, please allow access to the microphone.
Select ringtone for incoming Threema calls
Allow permission to manage phone calls while using Threema Call
Notifications for Threema have been disabled in the system settings. You will not be notified about new messages.
Allow Threema to run in the background so it can receive messages even when it’s not active.
In the following screen, make sure, “%s” is protected or excluded from any power management restrictions of your phone. Tap the “back” button when you’re done.
In the following screen, make sure “%s” is included in the list of apps that can autostart. Tap the “back” button when you’re done.
Location services are disabled. Would you like to enable them now?
%s is unable to receive messages in the background. Tap here to enable background data in settings.
Please let us know what we can do to improve (optional).
Would you like to rate us on Google Play as well?
Could not send your review to the server. Please make sure you’re connected to the internet before trying again.
No admin-verified Threema Work contacts found
Notification when a Threema Web session is active
%1$s protects your privacy more rigorously than any other messenger. Find out more in our %2$s.
To use %s, please accept the Privacy Policy.\n\n(Requirement as per EU regulation 2016/679)
Disable data collection for personalized suggestions (if supported by keyboard)
Type the @ character on the keyboard to directly address or mention a member of this group.
Get creative! Tap on the magic wand button to scribble or to add stickers and text to your pictures before sending.

All you need to chat is stored only on your device. You don’t have an account with us and we cannot help you out if you lose your phone or accidentally delete your data.\n\nThreema Safe creates automatic backups of all the important data, including your keys, your contact list and your group memberships (but no message content), anonymously on a secure server of your choice.
Do you really want to continue without enabling Threema Safe?
Please choose a strong password. You will need this password to restore your Threema Safe backup.
You can use Threema’s server or specify a third party backup server to use instead.
Please enter your Threema Safe password
Please enter the Threema ID you would like to recover
Please enter the mobile number or the email address linked to your ID
No backup found on the server. Check ID and password.
Multiple Threema IDs found. Please select the ID to use:
Enable Threema Safe to create automatic secure and anonymous backups of all your important data.
Please set a strong password to secure your Threema ID with Threema Safe. Don’t forget what you enter here!
If you disable Threema Safe, any existing backups will be deleted on the server. Continue?
Would you like to add the new contact “%1$s” to your contact list?
To receive messages when Threema is in the background please enable both Background data and Unrestricted data usage
The version of this backup is higher than the supported version. Please update to the latest version of this app.
Threema Safe backup failed for %d consecutive days. Tap here to check.
Backup or restore in progress. Check notification for status information.
Please make sure Threema is online before closing a poll.
All messages in this chat will be deleted. Continue?
Do you want to leave this group and delete it completely? All messages will be removed.
Do you really want to delete this group? All messages will be removed.
Tap here to share or print your encrypted Threema ID now
The selected password for Threema Safe is not secure and can be easily guessed by attackers. Please choose another one. Hint: Use a password composed of multiple individual words.
The Threema Safe password has been updated.
The push token has been cleared
The poll title cannot be empty
This chat is marked as a private chat. To enter it, please set up access protection first.
Important notice about notifications on MIUI

MIUI 10 disables sound and lights for all newly created notification channels by default (except for some apps deemed “important” by Xiaomi). You will have to explicitly enable them for each channel in your phone’s app-specific notification settings screen. Contact your phone’s manufacturer for more information.

MIUI disables sound, lights and floating notifications for all apps by default (except for some very popular apps deemed “important” by Xiaomi). You will have to manually enable these settings in your phone’s app-specific notification settings screen and repeat this procedure after each app update. Contact Xiaomi for more information.
Your administrator enabled Threema Safe for your device.
The app is locked. Cannot send.
For privacy reasons, thumbnails and screenshots are always prevented when "App lock" is enabled in security settings
Database migration failed: Not enough space left on device.

The hostname of the link you’re about to open is suspicious:

Displayed Hostname: %s
Real hostname: %s

This could be an attempt to trick you into opening a site pretending to be something else.

Would you like to continue anyway?
To scan QR codes, Threema needs access to the camera
To take a picture, please allow access to the camera
Enter at least two characters to search in messages
Create a data backup to save all your data, including chats and media.
No archived chats.\nTo archive a chat, swipe it to the left in the messages list
Please enter the Threema ID of the contact you would like to add
%1$s joined %2$s. Tap here to send a message.
%1$d contacts joined %2$s: %3$s. Tap here to send them a message.

The contact synchronization has been completely rewritten for increased performance and stability. As a consequence, manual linking of system contacts had to be removed and a separate validation option in settings is no longer necessary.

If you notice any problems with names or avatars of synchronized contacts or other unexpected behavior, please contact us through the usual bug reporting channels.

Thanks for testing %s!
Tap here to quickly display your Threema ID or to scan other people’s IDs
Cannot write to this directory. Please choose another one.
Show badges in bottom navigation tabs
Certificate Pinning Failure. Please check if \"Entrust Root Certification Authority - G2\" is installed and activated in the credentials storage of your device.
Certificate Pinning Failure. Possible Man-in-the-middle attack. If you have an ad blocker, content filter, or firewall app installed such as “AdGuard”, please disable it for Threema.

Our Privacy Policy has been updated to reflect the following change:

%1$s no longer depends on Google Play and Google Maps to provide map and POI data.

Please review the full Privacy Policy here.
Services not installed. Cannot switch to “push”.
Please enter at least three characters to search for a place.
No matching places found. Please modify your query.
The password does not comply with the guidelines set by the administrator.
Audio has been muted temporarily due to focus loss

To restore a data backup, first delete your Threema ID from the \"My Profile\" screen.\n\nWhen the app restarts, choose \"Restore from backup\", \"Other restore options\", \"Data Backup\" and then select the data backup file you want to restore.
Call disconnected due to complete audio focus loss.
Tap for picture, hold for video
To record a video, please allow access to the microphone
Videos and files larger than %s will always be downloaded on demand
Quoted message is no longer available
Disable notifications and reject calls outside of working hours
Remember what you enter here! Since %s does not save any passwords on severs, we cannot help you out, if you forget your PIN or password.
Tap on the system notification shown to restart the app now. If you cannot see the notification, please swipe down your phone’s notification bar.
Picture in Picture mode is disabled for %s. Please enable it in system settings.
Tap here to turn on the camera
The actual image quality depends on the network and the settings of the person you are talking to
For video calling, please allow access to the camera
Tap here to turn on speakerphone
Many thanks to our volunteer translators:\n%s
In addition to tap-proof voice calls, Threema now offers end-to-end encrypted video calls.
The other party started a video call. Tap here to turn on your camera as well.
The other party does not use a current app version or doesn’t allow video calls.
No biometrics are enrolled in the system.
Biometrics are not available on this system.
Missing permission to access biometrics data or hardware.
The dots are an indicator for a contact’s verification level.
Inhibit Smart Replies in Android notifications

The hostname of the link you’re about to open is suspicious.

This could be an attempt to trick you into opening a site pretending to be something else.

Would you like to continue anyway?
An error occurred sending one or more messages.
No more than %d objects can be sent at once.
Error. Media thumbnail could not be loaded
Only images or videos can be selected
No media found on this device
The original file is no longer accessible. Please re-send the message.
Tap here to adjust image resolution.
Are you sure you want to create an empty group?
Find faces in the image and have them blurred or covered with a smiley.
Audio could not be transcoded due to missing system support.
Very large videos may be compressed regardless of this setting.
*You’re here alone*\nUse this chat as a secure notebook for text, media or documents.
*You’re no longer alone in this chat*\nNew messages will be sent to all group members.
Hint: If you don’t add any group members, messages to this group will stay local. That’s ideal for securely storing notes, media or documents or transferring them to the desktop.
The app store was unable to validate your purchase. If you use Google Play, please clear the data of the Google Play Store App and reboot your device.
In the following screen please select the folder where data backups should be saved.

The server has detected two or more connections from different devices with the same Threema ID.

It is not possible to use the same Threema ID on several devices simultaneously. New messages are only transmitted to the device that last logged in to the server.

If you’re switching to a new device, please uninstall or disable %s on the old device and then reboot the new one.

Please disable "battery optimization" for %s to perform this task. As Xiaomi does not allow apps to call this settings screen directly, you will have to do this manually in your phone’s settings. Please contact Xiaomi support if you need assistance with disabling battery optimization.
Unable to import backup file. Make sure there’s enough free space on internal memory.
Empty recording or unable to determine length
Reset contact-specific settings for read receipts and typing indicator to default
